comment: барка на стойке/хранилище со старым имперским оружием

languages.text: Коррозия беспощадно поглотила старые имперские штыки, цепные мечи и лазружья.

traits.locale_text: Коррозия беспощадно поглотила старые имперские штыки, пиломечи и лазганы.

languages.text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
languages.original_text: Коррозия беспощадно поглотила старые имперские штыки, цепные мечи и лазружья.

traits.locale_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

languages.text: 这些古老的帝国刺刀、链锯剑与激光枪没能承受得住腐蚀的影响。
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

traits.locale_text: 这些古老的帝国刺刀、链锯剑与激光枪没能承受得住腐蚀的影响。

languages.text: La corrosión no ha tenido compasión con esta vetusta colección de rifles láser, bayonetas y espadas sierra del Imperium.
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

traits.locale_text: La corrosión no ha tenido compasión con esta vetusta colección de rifles láser, bayonetas y espadas sierra del Imperium.

languages.text: 腐食は容赦なく古い帝国陸軍の銃剣、チェーンソード、ラスガンを侵していた。
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

traits.locale_text: 腐食は容赦なく古い帝国陸軍の銃剣、チェーンソード、ラスガンを侵していた。

languages.text: Die Korrosion hatte keine Gnade mit diesen alten imperialen Bajonetten, Kettenschwertern und Lasergewehren.
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

traits.locale_text: Die Korrosion hatte keine Gnade mit diesen alten imperialen Bajonetten, Kettenschwertern und Lasergewehren.

languages.text: La corrosion n'a eu aucune pitié pour les vieilles baïonnettes, les épées tronçonneuses et les fusils laser impériaux.
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.

traits.locale_text: La corrosion n'a eu aucune pitié pour les vieilles baïonnettes, les épées tronçonneuses et les fusils laser impériaux.

languages.text: Bu eski İmparatorluk süngüleri, motorlu kılıçları ve silazerleri, pastan nasibini almış.
languages.original_text: Corrosion was merciless to these old Imperial bayonets, chainswords, and lasguns.
